captions.text: Irina Pegova
Daniyil Spivakovskiy
Galina Polskih
Yuris Zagars
Lesya Zhurakovskaya, Anastasia Bunina

- Thank you.
- You are welcome.
Olga Kogut, Snejana Egorova
Yuriy Rudchenko, Vladimir Abazopulo
In film by Maxim Papernik
"Don't rush into love"

Based on the novel "Marriage marathon"
by Tatyana Vedenskaya

Screenplay by Maxim Papernik,
Slava Oreschuk
Director of photography Vadim Savitskiy
Good afternoon, how can I help you?
Good afternoon.
Production designer Yuriy Uvarov

Could you tell me where's here
Premier Media company?
Costumes designed by Anna Osmekhina

That's at the sixths floor.
Elevator is right behind you.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Edited by Aleksey Shkindel
Valerie, get ready all reports, please.
Music by Sergey Kosarenko
Sound by Egor Irodov

After you, please.
Do you need sixths floor?
Yes.
Executive Producer Galina Balan-Timkina

Producers Aleksey Goncharenko,
Vladislav Ryashin

Ah, what a nice tummy has came to us.
Girls, look at this tummy.
Good day.
Hi, who do you need to see?
I need Ekaterina Barkova.

Wait a moment, please.
Premier Media, how can I help?
Rimka, that's for you. Well, what is it?
So, that's you?
Yes.
You live with Oleg Petrovich.
Well, yes. Wait,
but what's going on?
I simply would like to meet you. I'm Irina.

I have met already his wife
and Lydia, so now it's only you.
What Lydia you're talking about?

That one he lives
on Gogolevskaya Street with.
Don't worry, please.

I'm not jealous. This is for you.
I'm sure we'll become friends.

So what has happened?
Did he refuse to marry you or what?
Could you explain something?

He promised to marry me when
his daughter will be eighteen.

He said he doesn't want
to hurt her feelings.
Well?
Well what? She's already eighteen.
Well.

She's eighteen and she's
eight months pregnant.

- Who is pregnant, his daughter?
- Ira.
Hey, you can't come in.

Did you see today
a girl had come to see me?
Yes.
Anyway, she lives with Oleg Petrovich too.
What?

Only she lives with him just
one year and she's already pregnant.

Wait, wait, and tell me in more
details from this moment.
He has two more besides me.
Are you kidding?

He has eighteen years old Ira
and some Lydia, who is twenty five.
And?
And forty years old wife.
Get quiet, quiet.
You're a fool!

Quiet, darling, get down,
I'll wash your face.

Let's do it with cold water.
You see, that's it.
Six years, what will I say to my mom?
Get quiet, quiet, that's it.

This polygamist created a breeding farm.
What a jerk he's.
I don't know about breeding farm.

But I'm like an exhausted
rabbit from Playboy.
What should I do?

What I'll tell my mother?
She's going to kill me.
Maybe you'll go home for now?
You're real friend. Thank you.
Well and where will I go?
I have to pay my rent.
What?

You've waited six years
and couldn't wait another week?
I didn't think about that.
What did you think about?

Have you ever seen a man promised
to get divorced and had done it?
All right, I'll go, bye.
See you. You just don't worry.
You're only 30. That isn't 40 yet.
What she's got there?
That's a rag and some bags.

What a good girl, she is came
back home again. That's nice.
Maybe we'll help her out?
Just a moment, I'll get my key.
It's locked from inside.
Does not work or what?
Do you want me to knock?

I would prefer to do it into the face.
I had warned him to be home.

- So, do you want me to knock or not?
- Do it.
Hi.

Maybe something has happened,
some kind of attack?
Sure, he'd died from conscience attack.

What if to try through
the balcony from your neighbors?

Do you want me to do it?
That's a third floor.

- What is the name?
- Katya.
No, I meant his name.
His name's Romka.
Wait a moment.
Roma!
Shut up.
Roma, Roma!
Why are you yelling?
Roma!
It's not working.
Thank you very much.
How's about unloading and handling?
We've agreed for that price.
Go, please, leave.
That's all I have.
I've told you to leave.
What do you mean?
Didn't I unloaded rag and other stuff?
Don't you see she's fainted?
Never ever I will help somebody.
What kind of people are now.
They would help only for money.
Katyusha, perhaps you'll wait at my place?
No, I'll wait here.
I'll wait here.

Why would you wait here?
It's so dirty. Look around.
I can't miss Romka.
Did you come back for good?
I'm making some repairs at the other place.
I see. That's a lot of problems.
I understand.

I have something here
I wrote to our management.
Tell me how you like it.
Wait my neighbor, are you going home?
You, probably, tired, hungry and upset.

Spend another three minutes
and look at your stairway.

Let's take care of our stairway,
don't leave here cigarette butts.
Don't throw rubbish here and there.
Don't have a pee at every corner.
And, if your dog with joy suddenly shits,

not too lazy to remove him! 
Why must all suffer?
Romka, wait.
Oops, Katyusha, what are you doing here?
I'm waiting for you half a day.
Why didn't you come in?

I've like it here.
Come on, get all this stuff.
By the way, why didn't you open?
I was listening player.
I can see what kind of player you've got.
I live with music.
I see.
What is that?
That's Chizhevsky's lamp.
It kills bacteria, so be careful.

I believe our parents haven't
been here for quite a while.

Yes, about month and a half,
they're at the summer house.

There are some berries
they've to deal with.
Listen, how long you'll stay with me?
Forever,
and get the hell out of my room.

Don't lock the door anymore
and don't bring your girls here.
Do you understand?
Or mom will know about all of this.

Katya, don't be foolish. Wait,
I don't understand what's going on.

You know that we live
in separate rooms with my wife.

You know I love you. Katya,
I'm always near you, isn't it true?
Katya, wait for a moment.
Don't do anything you'll later sorry about.
Good day.
Hi.
How are you, Katyusha?
Are you suffering?
Katyusha, I've told everything.
Thank you, you're a true friend.

- Does it hurt?
- Katya, what are going to do?

I'm not sure yet.
I'll poison myself or hung.

Katyusha, you've to understand
no men are worth for you to suffer.

And your polygamous stallion
doesn't worth it even more so.
Who do you call stallion?
He's a real man with a true potential.

He slept same time with
four women from 18 to 40 years old.
And he'd taken care of all of them.
She's condescended to us mere mortals.

You should dump him.
Get my advice to you, Katya.

Get smart and come back to him,
otherwise you'll be alone.

Did he pay all your expenses? Sure he did.
Did he pay your rent? Yes, he did.
Well, you're a big girl.
You should get realistic.

Look at yourself. You're very ordinary,
not to mention your body.

And in one month you're
 going to hit age 30.
She looks great.
She looks wonderful.
Yes.

And she could get married with
wealthy man, if she would want to.
I could?
Yes, you could.

Well, if Katya will get married
with wealthy man.

Or for that matter if she'll get
married with decent man, I'll...
What will you do?

Then I'll walk naked
through our entire office.

Do you consider yourself
dressed now, Selivanova?
All right, I will take this bet.

First of all, you can't stay alone
and move in with somebody.

Where she'll move, into your studio
with your drunken husband?

Katyusha, then you'll decide
to stay old maid forever.
Dronova, don't be so jealous.

I'm jealous. I wish I could have
five kids and take care of them.

Girls, calm down. Yesterday
I moved in with my brother.

She moved in with brother
which means she went back home.

It's a good move.
Now you've to start a new life.

And we'll tell you how
you'll have to do it.
I'm not sure I could.
Well,

you'll swear you'll find
good looking and rich jerk.

Excuse my language.
And you'll get him to marry you.

And you'll do it according
logic and common sense.

He also shouldn't be older
than fifty years old.
I'm telling you I couldn't do it.
I wish you luck.
That will be quiet interesting to see.

How ordinary girl without any
will could achieve such a task.
Bon appetit.
I swear.
Thank you.
Gosh.

How many times I've asked you...
not to smoke in a kitchen.

How could I regulate my personal life
if I've such a mess at home?

What are you doing? I told
many times not to do it in a sink.
Couldn't you wash your dishes?
I had put it into the water.
I'll put you into the water now.
Romka, see you.
See you.

If you'll continue like this
I'll call mom for help.
Tell me,
have you actually been married?
What?
How dare you?
It means no?
Why not,
I was in some sense.
How's about official registration sense?
That's not your damn business.
What are you doing?
Romka, I'll kill you.
Give me my purse back.
I'll tell mom.
Don't dare to go through my stuff.

I've got you. Now I've
something to tell mom too.
Get your passport.
Hello, hi mom.
I just accidentally stopped by.
Romka is sleeping.
He's very tired, because he's working hard.

So, I don't want to wake him up.
Mom, wait, seems he just woke up.
Hello, mom, yes,
everything is all right.
Katya takes care of me.

She comes here almost every
day to cook for me something to eat.
I don't know what I would do without her.
Sure, say hello to dad.
We have so wonderful children.
What, you drink again?
That's just a beer.
They've said hello to you too.
Do you need phone number? I'll find it now.
Rimma, at least you say something.
What do I have to say?

Katya, one week has gone
already and nothing done yet.

You promised to help me, but
all you do that's criticizing me.
Katyusha is right.

Who can she find here?
We have only women here.

O, gosh, after Oleg Petrovich
I don't want anybody at all.

What do you think you're doing?
She's going to spoil everything.

Katya, in your case appearance
isn't most important thing.

As uglier is rich man
as easier to handle him.

Right, but I'm the one
who'll have to sleep with him.
You're wrong.

If you want a man to marry you,
you don't have to sleep with him.

You have to promise
him to do it, to tease him.
How do you know this?
That's theoretically.

Dzyuba, leave her alone.
Her mind is inside out anyway.

We can't leave her by herself.
We need to make what to do list.
What list?
Let's go.

Are you sure you want
me to do all of these?

Yes, unless you want to live with
mother and Romka all your life.

Then tell me precisely what
I've to do to be a real lady.

- Well, what makes a woman to be a woman?
- What?

- Her walk does.
- It sure does.

Walk is just a beginning.
What else's, Katyusha?
It's a mystery.
Mystery and what is my mystery?

Well, your walk is like its herd's
run to the watering place.
And mystery means are you woman or not.

So, mystery means am
I woman or I am not.
All right, that's enough. Write this down.
After lunch you'll work on your walk.
Done.

Tomorrow you'll wear a skirt, high heals,
make up and small purse.

I couldn't fit anything
in small purse, really.

I wonder what you are carrying
inside your huge bag.

Trust me I have there
very important for me stuff.
Let me see.

- No, please don't look.
What are you doing? - Katya, stop it.
Let's see, old magazine, some matches.

She doesn't have even
a make up inside this luggage.

Why do you have this business
book if you don't have any business?
Listen to me.

I won't talk to you
anymore without a lawyer.

That's all need yet for somebody
to go through my underwear now.

So, do you carry inside
this luggage underwear too?
I'm sorry, but what do you do here?
And what are you doing here? Who are you?
You see, my name's Ilya.
I believe I'm kind of got lost here.

How much longer will
you look at my torments?
Not for long, I just came up.

I've thought there won't be
anybody at the roof.

Would you mind to turn around
and keep going your way?
Excuse me, please.

Sorry, but I'm really curious
what you were doing here?
I won't say.
Why is that?
I'm a mystery woman.
Aha, do you work here?
I'm dancing.
How's about be serious?

I work in Premier Media
and what's about you?

I'm kind of relating to this building too.
I work in Inside Plus.
I never even heard about such company.
I accepted one vacancy about a week ago.

I've to admit I'm not familiar
with everybody here.
Most important I don't know your name.
My name's Katya.
Perhaps, you're Katherine the Great?

I'm an ordinary. So,
you're an advertiser too?

You could say so. As I can see
you don't really like it?

I just don't have much time.
I've to urgently rehearse my walk.

I have to quickly get married
with wealthy man.

You're an advertiser, which means
I'm wasting my time with you.
Even so, I see.

That's a mystery woman for you.
I just told you everything.

I have to be a mystery woman,
I have to be...
You know what? I have an offer for you.
Are you making fun of me?

I'm sorry. I'm not making fun of you.
I'm offering you a trade.

I'm very hungry and I'd like you to
show me some dining place here.
Instead I promise to buy you a lunch.

And I'll tell you everything
I know about wealthy men.
Do you agree?

Well, that dining place we have
here called cafeteria "Avenue".
I see.
Why are you so ceremonial? Let's go.

Why do you think men would like
to meet haughty mystery woman?

Do you think men
don't have enough problems?

Maybe you, mere mortals,
have plenty of problems.

But wealthy men have an
allergy from women. Can I have this?

Tell me, how many wealthy men
had got allergic from you?

Somebody will get really allergic
from me now right into the face.
Sorry, I didn't mean to offend you.

I just always was curious why girls
are dreaming to marry rich men.
Most of them are gangsters and swindlers.
About whom then we've to dream?
I don't know.
It's possible
to marry foreign businessman.

Sure, they're marrying Slavic
girls without any hesitations.

Lately that's even became
popular among them.

And their conditions of life
are just royal compare to ours.
Isn't that what are you dreaming about?
Bon appetit.
Thank you.

That's a genius idea. Why we
haven't thought about this before?

Katyusha, that advertiser
was sent to from the heaven.
Truth comes out of innocents' mouth.

Well, he's not an innocent.
He's already quite over thirty.
Is he good looking that your advertiser?

He's wearing glasses, yellow shirt
and some funny jacket.
He's kind of cool guy.
What's his name?
Ilya.
I know him.
That's Ilya Polyanskiy from Inside Plus.

Nothing special about him,
he's just a regular clerk.
By the way, he's from Odessa.

Katya, that's just what you need.
He's from province.

And a girl with a nice apartment
will be quite attractive for him.
This one will get married for sure.
Katyusha, Polyanskiy isn't what we need.

Why do you want to
waste time for some junk?

I'm not wasting. I've had lunch
with him and that's it.

Would he suggest me to marry
a foreigner if I'd flirt with him?
What he has to do with it?

All of them abroad have houses,
cars and income about 2000 euros.
Girls, I love my motherland.

Well, love it. That's quite Slavic
to love home from abroad.
All right, I see you.
No my dear, wait.

You're going to diner more often
than answering phone at work.
Me?
Have you heard something about fitness?

Do I have to now lift these damn
irons three hours a day?

Nobody's talking about three hours.
We'll do this way.
On Mondays you'll work out your shoulders.

On Tuesdays it will be your abs,
on Wednesdays your waist.
On Fridays it will be my funeral.

You see, fitness club doesn't fit
into my budget. That's so simple.

Fine, then you'll wake up six
in the morning, do some jogging.
You'll take cold shower.
What shower? Cold, I see.
She won't get too far.

What a young generation
we have now, drug addicts.

That's terrible. It's only morning
yet and she's barely moving.
Are you still sleeping?
No, I've died.
Well, I brought here some red caviar.
I guess I'll eat it alone.
How do you like my borsch?

Look who's here?
Living dead is coming back.

You know, that one who
wasn't your husband is a fool.

I would marry somebody like you just
because you cook such borsch.
Did you find patties?
Yes.
Well, so keep eating it.
I'll make a tea now with caviar sandwiches.

No, I can't eat. Dronova
says that's healthy.

I'll become slender and
beautiful like a model.
Model, what are you going to say mom?
What do you mean?

They're taking care of cherries
now and later egg plants are coming.

I've a feeling they will come
here after egg plants.

After egg plants they will
be taking care of apples.

- Good morning.
- Hi.
How are you?
Hi.
So, did you eat?
When?
Yesterday.
Yesterday I didn't eat.
Didn't eat anything at all?
Yesterday anything at all.
How's about today?

Premier Media, how can I help?
One moment, get the phone, please.

Yeah, right, only yesterday
I've considered you as my girlfriend.

Girls, stop fighting. I've found
great web site for a brides ads.

I think it's quite realistic
to marry a foreigner.

Katyusha, they would like
to get married with women like you.
Why is that?

First, our women are good
housewives and modest.

Second, our women won't file a law suit
for each and every problem.

Does it mean any woman
could find herself a husband?
Nice photo almost guaranties your success.
Katyusha, get your photo here.
Just a second, I have one.
We've to attach this, all right.
Well, well, everything's out of control.
What are you doing?
Yes, that's it.
Get my high heals, it's much better.
In our case high heals won't help.

We could present this part
of her body, it's not ready.

I'm sorry, dear, but you're not quite
fit international standards.

- Bosom, that's what we'll show to them.
- Yes, you're right.
Why do you need an umbrella?
It will look more impressive.
All right, hide your ears and smile.
Turn a little bit.
That's nice, freeze.
That's some kind of a total horror.

Well, we know her name,
now about bad habits.

Talking about habits, Katya,
you'll have to quit drinking.

Just a glass of red wine
couldn't be bad for you.
Not unless it's every evening.
Stop it.

We don't have bad habits,
now will attach photo and it's done.
Wait, wait.
That's it, done.
Girls, what have you done?
Wow, that's some lunch.
Hi.

Hi, it looks like you didn't
eat all week long.
No, it's just one day.
Can I?
Sure. Wow, look who's talking.
What? Sorry, but I'm not on diet.
I'm not planning to marry wealthy man.
You could feel sorry for me.
I sure do.

My girlfriends want me
to loose lots of weight.
What for? I believe you're in great shape.

I would even say your round
forms are quite popular today.
Thanks, you're such a gentleman.

You're welcome. What are they
offering to make you loose weight?

They told me not to eat, to run
every morning and take cold shower.

That's wonderful, I like cold shower,
cheers you up in the morning.

Only effect I've noticed
I want to eat and sleep.
I see. Then listen carefully.
Your body has to get use to it.

You have to start not with cold water,
but with slightly cool one.
You also have quit running. I'm serious.
How is that?

You'll walk every morning. Like sportsmen
are doing with headphones.

Have you seen it at TV?
I'm sure that will help.
I see, thank you.

Well, now tell me how
are your marriage plans?
What is that?
I mean did you find a wealthy man?
Bon appetit.
I've got it, next time.
Girls, we have a guest.
Come here.

We're deleting all this rubbish
and doing specific business project.
Wait, you'll select now some junk.
What junk? Why aren't you trust me?

Most of foreigners are
looking just for simple sex.
I don't see anything wrong about sex.
We have five quite decent candidates.

Two of them are Americans.
Both are about forty years old.

Two are Europeans and
one is from New Zealand.
That's the one.

No, I know nothing
at all about New Zealand.

Katya, that's a place where
"Lord of the Rings" movie was made.
We need precisely such a lord of one ring.
To be honest,
I don't really like them.

Katya, I don't know.
You do it yourself then.
I can't translate for you forever.

How could I translate if
I don't know well English?

Maybe you'll take English lessons?
You still have a time.
And as sooner you'll do it, as better.
I made inquiries.

Lessons start only in September
and it's very expensive.
That's a problem of course.

Though, I can study with
you if you would like to.
Really?

Sure. I can't guarantee you
fluent English, but you'll speak.
Do you know English?
I do a little bit.
Can you translate letters?
I can and even could write an answer.

That would be nice. Could it cause
any inconvenience for you?
I'll manage somehow.
Thank you.
Barkova, we're waiting.
Alright, I see you.
See you.

I found a man who will
practice English with me.

Don't tell me it is your Ilya you're
spending time in diner with.
Why you don't like him? He's a nice guy.

A good man. Especially free exercise 
agreed with me in English.

You're right, Katya. Ilya is your
realistic chance. Hold on to him.
You might never have another one.

Especially for him that you do not have 
to lose weight or learn etiquette
in order not to fall face in the dirt.

Katya, marry him, guy from Kherson
it is your real chance.

He's not from Kherson, but from Odessa.
And it's not your business.

Look, girls, I don't have money
to pay for English lessons.
That is precisely what I'm talking about.

You can earn money,
but you can't buy brain.
Let's go.
I don't think there's a problem.
Let them study English with Ilya.
All right, do it.

I just beg you don't get yourself
involved into another trouble.

- Are you listening?
- No.
Just trust me he isn't what you need.
I see you Monday.
She's so lucky.
Hi, come in.
Hi.
You have flowers, thanks.
Are you ready?
Yes, ready for what?
Ready to study.
Yes, with your help and a cake I agree.
What are you doing now?

What? No, you don't have
to take off your shoes. Come in.
I asked what you are doing.
Not much, we'll study English, come in.

There's only few minutes left
to see the end of my favorite show.

Can you imagine, Diana's husband
came back and she split with Dima?
That's terrible, pure Diana.
How will she live without Dima?
You're making fun of me.
I'm sorry.

Katya, now you try to express
your love to this show.
Only do it in English.
I love soap operas.
That's not quite right.

You see, when you don't mean true
feeling you've to use word like.
Bon appetit.
Thank you. Wait a moment.
Look, I need to translate this.
It's quite interesting.

I'd like to tell you about my
feelings looking into your eyes.

I can't wait in New Zealand
for this moment.

The only question I'm worry about
if you can to have children.
I would like to have kids very much.
I've no idea how I'll live with him there.
That's just great.
He has farm in New Zealand.
Well, you'll get use to it somehow.

At first you'll be occupied
with new romantics.

You'll have house by the river,
horse rides and moonshine kisses.
You're laughing at me,
but I need to write answer. Help me.

What about this, I value
congenial trusting relationship.
Or even better,
I'd like to achieve mutual understanding.

- Are you kidding?
- Not really.
You've a nice apartment.
It's belonging to my parents.
Where are they?

Who came up with idea
to send parents to village?
To my mom,
she's making all decisions in family.

Why do you have such
interest for my apartment?
It's just very nice and cozy here.
I spent half of my life at the dormitories.

Listen, who told you
to touch mom's tea set?
Why? I just thought...

You just thought you brought cake,
flowers and that's it.
Katyusha, what are you saying?

You've to remember here live my mom,
dad, brother and me.
I'll remember it.
It looks I've to go, sorry.

In this case, when you don't mean
true feeling, you've to say like.
You're a good student.
See you.

For the Katya's birthday
we've cooked big cake.
Cake was so much wide and so much high.
My dear girls thank you.
Happy birthday to you, Katyusha.

This is the best thing
to loose weight you can get.
I see, thank you.

Katya, this is for you
English dictionary, study it.

Maybe later you'll find
there husband for me too.
Katyusha, I'm too not empty handed.

Look, this is Lion Willer businessman
from Washington D.C.

He's 42 years old and fits into
our criteria. I wrote him an answer.

With such speed we'll have
your wedding in one month.

I don't know about wedding,
but someone will miss my birthday.

Girls, I'm sorry. Premier Media,
how can I help?
Katyusha, is that you?
Hi, mom.
I congratulate you with your birthday.
Thank you, mummy.

You've to be a good girl, respect
elders and you'll have happiness.
I congratulate you too.
How is Oleg Petrovich?

Everything is fine. He went
to business trip for now.
What a bad timing for it.
Sure, he left for a week.

That's a pity. What did he
give you for your birthday?
He gave me a gift.
Is it a good one?

That's kind of chain or something
more like а necklace.
Where are you going to celebrate?

We are going to be home with Romka,
just us alone, not a big deal.
Your dad sends you regards too.
He's a little bit busy right now.
Thanks, mom, you say hello to him.
Well, daughter, I kiss you.
All right, mom, I have to go.

You see what a fool I'm. What for
I've said about that necklace.

My mom is a very kind person,
but she never forgets anything.

And now I'll have to wear
this gift when I'll come to village.
When do you have to go there?

It can happen at any moment
if she will call me to go there.

I'll have to spend my monthly
income for that.

Oleg Petrovich wouldn't
buy me some bullshit... oops.
What was that?
I meant he wouldn't buy some cheap junk.

Why wouldn't you say
whole truth to your mom?

Tell her the truth that soon you'll
become citizen of New Zealand.

And write Oleg Petrovich into
the list of forever missing.

You don't know my mom. That will
be much worse than it is.
She'll start to take care about my future.
This will be much worse than Rimka.
It doesn't look like fun.
I've to go and work a bit.
But you'll come tonight.
So you'll show me at the door again?

I won't. Please, that's going
to be best gift for me.
What time do I have to be?
Come after work at six o'clock.
All right.
Are you coming for sure?
I'll obey for sure.
Give me a plate.
Katya, why have you invited him?
Well.
I see and how far did you go?

Not far, we even didn't
reach present continuing yet.
Don't get smart here.

Somebody has to open
for us champagne tonight.

Anyway, he's also cute and
very funny with his jokes.

That's something what I miss
with your computer's fiances.
I see. I don't like all of this.

My dear, somebody's waiting
for you in America.
And you're inviting here that Ilya.

I am going to cross somebody
out from a guest list.
Hi, this is for you and this is too.
Thank you.

My best wishes to you, happiness
and all that comes with it.
Thank you. Shut the door. Come in.
Good evening.
I would like to introduce, that's Ilya.
It's nice to meet you.
Romka, get it. Sit down.
What's in this box?
Can I?
Keep going, open up.
Well, let me see.
Ah, what a beauty it is.
That's, perhaps, incredibly expensive?
I can't accept a gift like that.
Why?
That's simply too much.
It's look like bribery.

What are you talking about?
This is just a cheap imitation.
So, that's not real jewelry?
Of course it isn't.

Well, thank you then. You could
come without any gift at all.
We've talked today with you.
What we have talked about?
What do you mean without gift?

We talked about your mom
and Oleg Petrovich's gift.
So you didn't forget.

Wow, I've now what to show
my mom. You're genius.
Katyusha, try it on.

That's incredibly beautiful
piece for imitation.

Finally our jewellers learned how
to do things. Who's done it?
Thank you again.

To be honest I don't
understand this at all.

All right, guys, we've a good reason
to have a drink again.
Let's drink to new gift.
Boys you have to take care of girls.
Let's do it.
Wait a moment.
I congratulate you.

Katyusha, I'm a not really
good dancer, honest.
All right, let's free more space.

Katya, I think somebody's
ringing a door bell.
Romka, mommy has come.
Happy birthday, daughter.
At last you're here.
Wait a minute.
Good evening, Roma.

Hi mom, how did you happen
to be here? What a surprise.
That's sure is.
Good evening.
Mom, do you want something to eat?
No, I'm not hungry, just some drink.
Here's mineral water, juice or tea.
No, just get me some lemonade.
Well, introduce me to your friends.
Mom, all these girls are working with me.

This is Tanya Dronova, Rimma Voronina,
you know her, Anechka.
I'm pleased to meet you.
Too bad that Oleg Petrovich isn't here.

Katya, he didn't tell you
when he'll come back?
No, not yet.
He has to come back in a week.
Who's this young man?
Good evening.
Good evening, my name's Ilya.
Katya never told me about you.
You see, I work with Oleg Petrovich.
So you work with Oleg Petrovich.

Yes, in the same department,
he's my direct supervisor.
That's what it is.

And you know, Oleg Petrovich made
sort of discovery in advertising.
I'll tell you about it now.

He realized in advertising goods
isn't the most important thing.
And what is?

We have positive emotions that we're
dreaming to experience in life.
Isn't it so?
Yes, it is.
Let's take champagne as an example.
Roma, get your mom champagne.

It looks like just a regular wine,
but it has one small detail.

That's bubbles and these small bubbles
make us to like champagne.
Do you understand? That's so simple.
Let's drink to love.

Katyusha, I wish true love
would always live in your heart.
Happy Birthday.

Have you seen a gift
Oleg Petrovich gave to Katya?
No.
Show it.
That's very beautiful.
Why did you say it?
Oh, I completely forgot.
I believe it's time to get lost.
Katya, this is for you. Try it on.

What we're going to do?
Maybe we'll go to some club?

Sure, we'll go to place for those
who are thirty and older.
And I'll get a free ticket there.
So what kind of ideas do we have?
I feel myself distressed in this dress.
Cheer up, my friend.

Let's go to play bowling. I made
an arrangement for us.
Where?

Great, bowling is the only place
where your dress is meaningless.

I'm not sure, girls. Tomorrow work
and now is night already.
Don't be scared. I never played it too.
So what? Are we going?
Let's go.
How are you?
Those balls are so slippery.

I would play much better
if not for my nails.
Get up and keep going.
Thank you very much. Everything is so cool.

That's the best Katya's birthday.
Thank you.
I'm very glad.
What are you thinking about?
I think how nice this is
and possibly soon I'll never see it again.
Give me a break.

White holes in the black
velvet are everywhere.
They're not quite the same.
My hand is numb from those balls.

You've created this evening yourself.
Now you think how end it.
Let's split from here.
I'm serious, nobody will even notice.
That's great.

Well, in such case where does
the princess want to be moved?
To the moon.
I see.

Please, there's a restaurant near.
I'll show.
Are you comfy?
Yes, I'm. Why?
Perhaps, you're a little bit hot?
No.
My eyes are tired.

You know, when it's dark
this dress in not too bad.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Thank you.

You look like a housewife
from commercial in 60th.
What?

- You're a jerk.
- Why are you hitting me?

- I'm not a housewife, I'm a princess.
- What an ugly comparison you've found.
Are you ticklish?
Yes.

- So, are you jealous?
- Yes.
What are you doing?
I put my arm around you.

- I'd like to see if I won't get hit by electricity.
- Aha, that's what it is.
Did you get hit?
Not yet so far.

That's strange. It should have
happened long time ago.

This dress even more pleasant
when I'm groping it.
I could let you to wear it.
Are you serious? I'll think about it.
Thank you very much. Let's go.
Please, go ahead.
Good evening.
What is it?

Are you nuts? Here's a glass
of water cost a hundred dollars.
Well, it's your birthday after all.
Could we have one drink in nice place?
Let's go.
Let's go I've said.
Well, only if it's one drink.
Good evening.
Follow me.
Let's go.

- Please, have a seat.
- Thank you.
Waitress, we'll have...
Invite a sommelier?
Let's have a cognac.
Yes, cognac it is.
And maybe we'll have a salad.

What kind would you like
Caesars salad or Greek?

No, let's have just with
cucumbers and tomatoes.
I'd recommend Fuagra.
I just don't know any of it.

I got it. Let's just have four cognacs
and two salads. That's it.
Young man I can hear you very well.

How often do you visit
such expensive places?
Not really, but sometimes I have to.
You see,

restaurant is a good place
for business lunches.

Ah, sorry, so we've now
kind of business meeting.
Com on stop it, don't pick on me.
You know, you're a good liar.
What do you mean?
Well, I mean champagne and bubbles.

Oleg Petrovich is your supervisor.
It's just wonderful.

I believe your mom has liked it.
It looked quite convincing.
At least I tried.
Please help yourselves.
Thank you.
You're welcome.
Katya, but your birthday is real.
Let's drink to you.

Anyway, today everything
is kind of different.
What it suppose to mean?

You're sort of different.
You're saying some riddles.

Katya, that's all right.
I'm still Polyanskiy.

I'm seating right near you.
Today is your birthday.

I've to move closer, because
you're getting disoriented.
Come here, I say come closer.
Sorry, I'll keep an eye on her.
Get quiet.
Bon appetit.
Thank you.
Bon appetit.
Thanks, so this is a moon.
I see, wait. Get up, please.
What are you saying?
I've said get up.
What's now?

Close your eyes. Don't be
afraid and don't look.
What are you doing?
Let's go.
That's some kindergarten.
Don't worry.
Carefully here are a few steps.

One, two, three, four,
five and now come here.
Don't worry,
keep going and now stop.
Get up here
and look.
Oops, I'm scared.

Excuse me. I didn't know
you afraid of heights.
Why did you bring me here?
Do something.
See you. Take it.
That's it.

Katyusha, why do you keep soaks
and underwear in same drawer?
Mom, that's Romka's drawer, not mine.

I've taught you everything
has to be in separate drawers.
You've a good morning mommy.
Why do you have all together?
How Oleg Petrovich could tolerate this.

I'm telling you all these,
but all for nothing.

Don't make a shower to hot.
It's bad for your blood vessels.
All right, I won't.
She's coming.
Hi, are you waiting for me?

I don't understand how could
you leave us there and split.
Girls, I've had a few drink and forgot.

You simply forgot what
we are doing for your future.

You just ignored us and split
with the first who came along.

- Have you kissed?
- Well.
That's enough. Why did she only take us in?

- If you only knew what an evening he's done for me?
- He invited me to a nice restaurant.

You're such fool. He's doing
it because your apartment.
Or maybe you just want a simple sex?

What's wrong about it
and who doesn't want it?

Well, for six years she didn't have
a man besides Oleg Petrovich.

It won't hurt if she'll get an extra
experience for a foreigner.

All experience she's getting now
that's how to lie and get drunk.
Well.
Just push the button.
Let's go to eat.
That's what you have asked.

Katya, what do you have
with Polyanskiy? Is it serious?
Not much, we just had some fun.
We even didn't get in touch with him.

I've thought you already went
to the marriage registration office.
Rimka, you know you were right.
I was right about what?

About everything, I shouldn't go
out and kiss with this Polyanskiy.

He didn't call even once me
for entire week.
That's because you're a naive fool.
We're spending two months on you.

And what have you done? You went
after a guy who just kissed you.

Actually, I was really ready
to do for him anything.

Calm down, please stop it.
Don't you think I understand?
Katyusha, I used to be like that myself.
Good day.
Girls, that's what you call a destiny.
Katyusha, here's an answer to your prayers.
Really, where?

Do you remember my gift
to you for your birthday?

I mean Lion Willer that
businessman from Washington D.C.?
He's coming to get to know you closer.
Look, girls, what colour her face became.

Primarily prevails green.
It's a colour of dollar.
Translate this.
Dear Ekaterina.

I glad to inform, that I've got
a chance to meet you in person.

I'm coming on company business,
so I could meet with you for sure.
Do you agree?

Let me know how to find you
and whether you're glad to my arrival.

Who knows, maybe we'll
go back already together.
Where will I go?
Katyusha, aren't you glad?

No, I'm glad, of course I'm glad.
Write him an answer.
What to write?
Write I'll be glad to see him and waiting.

Write my address and phone.
Well, do what ever you want to.
All right, I'll receive now.
Katyusha, we'll quickly get ready.
Get ready for what? I'm ready as it is.

I'm jogging every morning,
taking cold shower.

I've some bites instead of lunches.
I've a make up and wear skirt.
What else do I have to do?

I'm sure you'll have to get undressed
and what do you have to show?

You have no tan, no epilation,
 nothing at all.

Americans are fastidious
and like perfection.

You've to be sensible delicate
soul wrapped into beautiful a body.
They won't settle for less.
We still have a time to get ready.
Yes.
No, we have not. I read.

I have a ticket on July, 30th,
sincerely yours, Lion.
What's today?
Today is 27th.
Only three days left.

Well, Katya, you'll take days off.
I'll cover you.
What do I have to do?

"Do at home abs exercises;
make a face mask and epilation."

Go to nail place and make
manicure with pedicure.

I can't afford it myself. Sorry, but
I just moved recently and I...
So, why you didn't say anything?
Girls, what are you doing?
Be quiet.
Katyusha, everything is all right.
I don't feel comfortable, really.
Take it, come on.
You're so nice to me.
Are you looking for Katya?
Yes, I'm looking for Katya Barkova.
She's not here.
I see.

I'm sorry, but could I have
a few words with you?
Sure.

You know, I would like to tell
you something for quite sometime.
Yes.
I hope you'll understand me right.
We know each other for a long time.
Is this has to be so painful?
Yes.
Sure, all right.
Hi.
How are you, lost soul?
I'm sorry. Excuse me.
Hey, where are you to?
I've lots of work. Excuse me.
Don't you think that isn't nice?
Perhaps, you're talking now about your tan.

You dragged me into
that Moon and kissed me.
Then you disappeared for ten days.
And now you're saying you need to work?
I don't see here anything criminal.
Would you explain what's going on?
Would you really like to know?
Yes, I do.

I'm sorry. Point is that
I steal a girl from her birthday.
That's a girl I'd like a lot.
I invite her to restaurant and kiss.

Next day I have to go
to an urgent business trip.

But when I come back I learn
she prepares to leave with her fiance?
I see she found better prince.
I'm not going to leave anywhere. Trust me.
Tell this to your Lion.

That's for him you're
visiting tan place. I understand.
Americans like grill. Excuse me.
Katya, someone rings the door bell.
So open it.
We have the same mother.
Who are there, cops? What have you done?
That's for you, your American.
He's having coffee in our kitchen.

What American, how could I forget?
Wait, what coffee?
Don't drink it, wait.
I'm so happy to see you.

I dreamed you're beautiful woman,
but I see a queen.
Romka!
He need to the rest room.
Roma, show him our rest room.
Didn't you see that isn't coffee?

I found this can inside
a kitchen cabinet, why?

Rimka gave me this very strong laxative.
Why are you laughing?
Didn't you see that's not coffee?
He says he's eaten something in the plane.
Stop laughing.
Well, what?

That's just individual
intolerance of local water.

Someone will get now individual
 intolerance of own sister.
Tell him to drink this strong tea.
What?
He's asking when he could see you tomorrow.
Tomorrow, tell him that not...
You're a dickhead.

Sorry, my name's Lion.
I'm looking for Ekaterina Barkova.
Barkova is over there.
Katya, you have a guest.
I'm so happy to see you. May I kiss you?
I'll go.
We have to get a visa for you.
Visa, so fast?

That isn't fast. You'll see America
and my big empty house.
Your house?
I have no passport.

No problem, your passport it's my problem.
Do you understand?
Katyusha, I can't even recognize you.

You're so lucky.
I can't believe you're leaving.

Rimma fill glasses. Maybe it's
a last time we're drinking together.
That's for good luck.

Good girl, Katya, just think
about life that is waiting for you.
Look, is this a ring?
I noticed this diamond right way.

That's something, unlike someone
gives a cheap necklace.
To the luck.

By the way, when did
you see Polyanskiy last time?
See whom, Polyanskiy?
Yes, Polyanskiy.

Get him out of your head.
You're almost married woman.
Nevertheless.
Why are you not saying anything?
That's not important anymore.

Why it's not important?
Maybe he forgave me?
Forgave? What for he forgave you?

I can't leave just like that.
I've to talk to him.

I'd give up everything. I'd sell
everything to give Lion money back.
What do you have?
You've his diamond ring?

I'd borrow. I wish I could
say just a word to him.
You don't need to talk with him.
Why?
He's dating Selivanova, that's why.
Anya.

What Anya? As soon Lion
came here she's consoled him.
What do you mean consoled?
We mean in erotic and sexually.
How this is could be?
Well, she sleeps with him.
Hello.
Katyusha, dear, is that you?
Why are you at Romka's place all the time?

We have gathered apples here
with your dad and want to bring it.
Will Oleg Petrovich be there?
No, mom, Oleg Petrovich won't be here.
Why?
Well, because he... because I...

What are you mumbling there?
Tell me, what happened with him?
Have split a part with him?
Yes and quite a while ago.
Well, what's going to happen now, divorce?
All this is because you didn't have kids.
I've told so many times to have a baby.
Now you'll remain alone for life.
Who are you talking to in English?
I talk to my American fiance.
With whom?

Hello, Katya say something.
What's going on there?

Katya, I'll leave everything
now and come to you.
Mom, come here.
I'll introduce you to my future husband.

We'll come with dad tomorrow
around lunch time.
What?
Hi.
How are you, daughter?
That's for your past birthday.
What did he say?
He said he's glad to meet bride's parents.
With whom?
It means with you. Aren't you my parents?
Yes, we're.
Well, where will he work?
He already works in Washington.
What's next?
Mom, that's it.
Are you saying you'll live in America?
What did he say?
He said we're leaving tomorrow.
Did you say tomorrow?

Does it mean if I wouldn't call
you I wouldn't know anything?

You won't go anywhere. I forbid you.
This is some kind of nonsense.
Where Roma was looking?

She never could do something
like that on her own.
You see. Where did he go?
Mom...
Where did you dig out this Liomo?
His name's Lion.

What he's saying?
I can't understand at all.

He said these are passports,
tickets to America and very expensive.
That's engagement ring with diamond.

Katerina is my bride and
I'm asking your blessing.
And we'll make for you now baby.
O my god.

Katya, what are you doing?
This is your dad.

You've to see to it that she
would have enough sleep.
She could stay all night watching TV.
Dad, what are you saying?
Be silent.
I'm blessing you.
That's it, bye.
Mom, I'll call.
Daughter, you write us.
Everything's all right.

You've a flight to Washington
with a plane change in Paris.

After registration you've
 to go to inspection, please.
What inspection?

Customs inspection, that's
your first trip abroad?
Yes.
Have a nice trip.
Thank you.
Young lady, is this your bag?
Yes.
Have you declared all your valuables?
I have only this ring and that's it.
Put your bag down, please.
Open it.
Open side pocket too.
Is that yours?
Yes.
Take a bag and follow me.
That's my birthday gift.

If you have done with registration,
go to the gate for boarding.
Let's go with me.
Young man, go to the boarding area.
Your necklace is real.

I don't know where could
be done such a nice ruby imitation.
That's for sure not a cheap imitation.
It's worth at least 15 thousands.
15 thousands roubles?
15 thousands dollar, that's enough.
We have to process a detainer.

I wish I knew where to find such man
that secretly gives rubies.
Do you understand you've violated the law?

We can stop you of leaving
our country at all.
Are you really? Wow, thank you.
Available? Let's go.
Would you tell me where's 28th?
Here it is. .
Where's Polyanskiy?

- What kind of matter do you have?
- I've private matter.

Ilya Alexandrovich is busy.
He's a meeting.

You would rather call
or make an appointment.
Wait, where are you going?

If anybody doesn't agree the way
I work, you can simply resign.

Ilya Alexandrovich,
I told her you've a meeting.
I have to talk with you.
Leave me alone.
I have to talk with you.

Colleagues, let's take a 15 minutes break.
Thank you.
Have a seat, please.
So, you're Ilya Alexandrovich?

You just never told me
you're Ilya Alexandrovich.

You know, now I understand
why you're with Selivanova.
You match each other very much, nice pare.
You lie as convincing as she does.

Unfortunately, I don't understand
what you're talking about.

- You don't understand?
- No.
I'll explain.

You know, because of you
I wasn't let out of country.
What a nuisance, that it happened.
Because of you I could go to America.
What a pity.
And I've lost my potential husband.

I'm sincerely sympathizing
with you, trust me.

But I don't understand
what I have to do with it?

- You don't understand.
- No, I completely don't understand.

What's about this? This object
tells you about anything?
I see it first time.
Maybe you'll look at it again.
No.

I'll remind now. You gave me
this for my 30th birthday.
Are you serious?
Yes, you told me that's a cheap imitation.
I believed it, but customs agents didn't.
What a true professional agents at customs.

Sure, they saw rubies right
away and almost arrested me.
I don't remember your middle name.
It's Sergeevna, please.
Right, so, Ekaterina Sergeevna.

I've to say right now you've
defile my good name. It's a slander.
It can't be.

I gave you a meaningless trinket,
cheap imitation.

This, perhaps, you've
changed intentionally.

Or possibly there was
a mix up at the store.
Possibly your office is a mix up too?
Tell me,

would you accept this gift
if you knew that's real rubies?
Katya, tell me the truth.

You see, you don't know yourself
what do you want.

You ruined my life.
You've done it intentionally.

You knew I'm leaving now.
You could call me, you could call me.
Come here, I'll catch you anyway.

And Selivanova, I won't
forgive you Selivanova.
No, I'm not jealous.

Could you call me at least
once during those two weeks?

title: Не Торопи Любовь / Don’t Rush into Love. Фильм. StarMedia. Лирическая Комедия. 2008
